# MCView

## <u>Features of MCView</u>

### Manifold tab

> Click on the **help** button for step by step explanation of interface features!

- View gene expression manifold. 
- Color manifold by gene expression. 

### Genes tab

-   Two genes can be compared over the manifold.

Clicking on any metacell will select it for further examination in the
Metacells tab.

### Metacells tab

-   Two metacells can be specifically examined, and compared.

Choose a metacell by entering its number, or by selecting directly from
the 2D-projection.

### Annotate tab 

- Assign cell types and colors to metacells
